title: Cremet pasta med asparges

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '250 g frisk pasta' is best matched with 'pasta' because 'frisk pasta, fettucine spinat' and 'fyldt frisk pasta' are more specific types of fresh pasta, and 'pastasovs' is a sauce, not pasta itself. 'pasta' is a broader category that accurately represents fresh pasta without being overly specific or a final meal.

The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' as it is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available in the options. 'hvidløg i olie' is more processed, and 'rødløg' and 'hvidløgsbaguette, frost' are different ingredients or final products.

The ingredient '1 løg' is best matched with 'løg' as it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available. 'løg, ristede' and 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost' are processed forms, and 'rødløg' is a different type of onion.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: 1 bundt asparges = 500 g, 1 * 500 g = 500 g = 0.5 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 bdt grønne asparges' is best matched with 'asparges, grøn' as it is the most direct and least processed form of green asparagus. The other options are different types of vegetables or processed forms.
The ingredient '1 squash' is best matched with 'squash' as it is the most direct and least processed form. 'avocado', 'rasp', and 'aubergine' are different ingredients.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Håndfuld krydderurter (basilikum, oregano osv.) = 0.025 kg, 1 * 0.025 kg = 0.025 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 stor håndfuld frisk basilikum' is best matched with 'basilikum, frisk' as it directly specifies 'frisk' basilikum. 'basilikum, tørret' is a processed form, and 'persille' and 'pesto' are different ingredients or products.

The ingredient '2 dl fløde' is best matched with 'fløde 38 %, piskefløde' as it is the most direct and common form of cream for cooking. 'flødeis' and 'likør, kaffe med fløde' are final products, and 'flødeost, ost 60+' is a different dairy product.
The ingredient '1 dl vand' is best matched with 'vand, postevand' as it is the most direct and least processed form of water. The other options are different ingredients or products.

The ingredient '6 spsk revet parmesan' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is the most direct and common form of parmesan cheese. 'vegansk ost, revet eller skiver' is a different type of cheese, and 'fyldt frisk pasta' and 'brie, ost 45+' are different ingredients or products.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af ingrediens ikke angivet, LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.05 kg, 2 portioner * 0.05 kg = 0.1 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 håndfuld mozzarella' is best matched with 'mozzarella ost, 30+' as it is the most direct and common form of mozzarella cheese. 'mozarella sticks' is a processed product, and 'parmesan ost, 32+' and 'pasta' are different ingredients.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af ingrediens ikke angivet, LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.005 kg, 2 portioner * 0.005 kg = 0.01 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'Lidt salt' is best matched with 'salt, bordsalt (jodberiget)' as it is the most direct and common form of salt. The other options are different ingredients or products.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af ingrediens ikke angivet, LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.005 kg, 2 portioner * 0.005 kg = 0.01 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'Lidt peber' is best matched with 'peber, sort' as it is the most common and general form of pepper. 'peber, chili' and 'peber, chili, konserves' are specific types of chili pepper, and 'peberfrugt' is a bell pepper, which is a different vegetable.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af ingrediens ikke angivet, LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.015 kg, 2 portioner * 0.015 kg = 0.03 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'Olie' is best matched with 'olivenolie' as it has the highest emission factor among the available oil options and is a common type of cooking oil. All the oil options are similar in processing level, so the one with the highest emission factor is chosen.

instructions:
Sæt en gryde over med vand til pastaen. Kog det efter anvisning på pakken og hæld vandet fra så det ikke tilberedes yderligere.
Knæk enderne af de grønne asparges (enderne kan ikke spises). Skær dem i ca. 1 cm lange stykker.
Svits løg og hvidløg i olie på en varm pande. Tilsæt squash og asparges og svits det yderligere et par minutter, drys med en knsp salt og lidt peber.
Kom så vandet på panden og smuldrer bouillonterningen på så den hurtigere opløses. Hæld fløden på sammen med revet parmesan og vend det hele godt rundt.
Vend den friske pasta i blandingen og tilsidst mozzarella og frisk basilikum. Smag til om retten evt kan bruuge lidt ekstra kværnet peber. Velbekomme!
